name: E-Z Tomato Toast
author: BINIWIT
summary: Easy appetizer of garlic seasoned tomatoes on sliced baguette.
ingredients: 6 large tomatoes, cut into thin wedges
1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange the tomato wedges in a single layer in a skillet over high heat, and cook 1 minute, until lightly scorched
Drizzle tomatoes with olive oil, and mix the garlic into the skillet
Gently cook and stir until tomatoes and garlic are tender
Arrange the baguette slices on a baking sheet, and toast 5 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly brown
Spread toasted slices with butter, top with the tomatoes, and season with salt and pepper to serve
